first_para: John Nicolson is a Scottish television presenter and journalist based in Glasgow. He has reported for and presented many high profile network news shows in Britain.

full.extract:
John Nicolson is a Scottish television presenter and journalist based in Glasgow. He has reported for and presented many high profile network news shows in Britain.
In January 2015, he was selected as the SNP candidate for East Dunbartonshire in the May 2015 Westminster election.
full.title: John Nicolson (journalist)
